revision.text: {{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Use input type |rationale=Use this property to annotate a property article if you want to choose a different input type for that property in automatically created Semantic Forms. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Is uploadable |rationale=Use this property to annotate a property if you want that a file upload button appears next to the form input field of the property in an automatically created Semantic Form. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Boolean| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Form input help |rationale=Use this property to annotate a property if you want that a help icon with a help message appears next to the form input field of the property in an automatically created Semantic Form. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Delimiter |rationale=Users may enter several values in a fprm input field for a property in an automatically created Semantic Form. Use the ''delimiter'' annotation to choose the delimiter. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Field sequence number |rationale=The Automatic Semantic Forms Extension orders form input fields for properties alphabetically. Use the ''Field sequence number'' annotation on property articles to reorder their form input fields. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Number| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Default value |rationale=You can use this property to annotate a property article, if you want that the form input field for that property contains a default value in an automatically created Semantic Form. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Validator |rationale=Use the ''Validator'' property to annotate a property, if you want to validate a user's input into the property's form input field in an automatically created Semantic form with a regular expression. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1|:1]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Use display template |rationale=The Automatic Semantic Forms Extension creates silent annotations, i.e. ammotations that are only displayed in the factbox and not in the rendered article. Use the ''Use display template'' to assign a template to a category so that the data which is entered for that category is displayed via a template. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:217.110.222.148 }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Category; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Form input label |rationale=Use this property to annotate a property article if you want to choose an alternative label for its form input field in an automatically created Semantic Form. |part of=Automaticsemanticforms |Has_author=User:WikiSysop }} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[ [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]

|<noinclude> <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls.[[Part of bundle::Baseontologybundle| ]] </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Baseontologybundle |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, |hints_for_templates_and_forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Short description|}}}|| {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=}} | {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Form=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Semantic form ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value=''main namespace''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value={{{Has special namespace|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value={{{Example article|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Category=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Category ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Content bundle=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Content bundle ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Vendor:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Version:|Value={{{Version|}}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Installation dir:|Value={{{Installation dir|}}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Dependency:|Value={{{Dependency|}}} }} {{!}}} |Property=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Property ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |User defined rule=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''User defined rule ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Content bundle:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |All content bundles=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''All Content Bundles of ''{{SITENAME}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |#default=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" {{!}} [[Image:Stockage.png|40px]] {{!}} '''{{#show:{{{PAGENAME}}}|?Content title=}}''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid rgb(159,80,0); background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" }}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=Baseontologybundle |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |Has author=User:WikiSysop |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=Baseontologybundle |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |Has author=User:WikiSysop |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}
